meetingTitle: A.A. ON THE BOWERY - AA On The Bowery

streetAddress: 220 West Houston Street, New York, NY
meetingNotes: NOTE: Meeting only meets on the 1st & 3rd Sunday of each month *Big Book Workshop, Meeting ends at Noon.
No shoes worn in meeting location. A short meditation opens the meeting.
